UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a specified resource

UpdateAccountAuditConfiguration.name: UpdateAccountAuditConfiguration
UpdateAccountAuditConfiguration.description: Grants permission to configure or reconfigure the Device Defender audit settings for this account

UpdateAuditSuppression.name: UpdateAuditSuppression
UpdateAuditSuppression.description: Grants permission to update a Device Defender audit suppression

UpdateAuthorizer.name: UpdateAuthorizer
UpdateAuthorizer.description: Grants permission to update an authorizer

UpdateBillingGroup.name: UpdateBillingGroup
UpdateBillingGroup.description: Grants permission to update information associated with the specified billing group

UpdateCACertificate.name: UpdateCACertificate
UpdateCACertificate.description: Grants permission to update a registered CA certificate

UpdateCertificate.name: UpdateCertificate
UpdateCertificate.description: Grants permission to update the status of the specified certificate. This operation is idempotent

UpdateCertificateProvider.name: UpdateCertificateProvider
UpdateCertificateProvider.description: Grants permission to update a certificate provider

UpdateCustomMetric.name: UpdateCustomMetric
UpdateCustomMetric.description: Grants permission to update the specified custom metric

UpdateDimension.name: UpdateDimension
UpdateDimension.description: Grants permission to update the definition for a dimension

UpdateDomainConfiguration.name: UpdateDomainConfiguration
UpdateDomainConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update a domain configuration

UpdateDynamicThingGroup.name: UpdateDynamicThingGroup
UpdateDynamicThingGroup.description: Grants permission to update a Dynamic Thing Group

UpdateEventConfigurations.name: UpdateEventConfigurations
UpdateEventConfigurations.description: Grants permission to update event configurations

UpdateFleetMetric.name: UpdateFleetMetric
UpdateFleetMetric.description: Grants permission to update a fleet metric

UpdateIndexingConfiguration.name: UpdateIndexingConfiguration
UpdateIndexingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update fleet indexing configuration

UpdateJob.name: UpdateJob
UpdateJob.description: Grants permission to update a job

UpdateMitigationAction.name: UpdateMitigationAction
UpdateMitigationAction.description: Grants permission to update the definition for the specified mitigation action

UpdatePackage.name: UpdatePackage
UpdatePackage.description: Grants permission to update a package

UpdatePackageConfiguration.name: UpdatePackageConfiguration
UpdatePackageConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the package configuration of the account

UpdatePackageVersion.name: UpdatePackageVersion
UpdatePackageVersion.description: Grants permission to update the version of the specified package

UpdateProvisioningTemplate.name: UpdateProvisioningTemplate
UpdateProvisioningTemplate.description: Grants permission to update a fleet provisioning template

UpdateRoleAlias.name: UpdateRoleAlias
UpdateRoleAlias.description: Grants permission to update the role alias

UpdateScheduledAudit.name: UpdateScheduledAudit
UpdateScheduledAudit.description: Grants permission to update a scheduled audit, including what checks are performed and how often the audit takes place

UpdateSecurityProfile.name: UpdateSecurityProfile
UpdateSecurityProfile.description: Grants permission to update a Device Defender security profile

UpdateStream.name: UpdateStream
UpdateStream.description: Grants permission to update the data for a stream

UpdateThing.name: UpdateThing
UpdateThing.description: Grants permission to update information associated with the specified thing

UpdateThingGroup.name: UpdateThingGroup
UpdateThingGroup.description: Grants permission to update information associated with the specified thing group

UpdateThingGroupsForThing.name: UpdateThingGroupsForThing
UpdateThingGroupsForThing.description: Grants permission to update the thing groups to which the thing belongs

UpdateThingShadow.name: UpdateThingShadow
UpdateThingShadow.description: Grants permission to update the thing shadow

UpdateTopicRuleDestination.name: UpdateTopicRuleDestination
UpdateTopicRuleDestination.description: Grants permission to update a TopicRuleDestination

ValidateSecurityProfileBehaviors.name: ValidateSecurityProfileBehaviors
ValidateSecurityProfileBehaviors.description: Grants permission to validate a Device Defender security profile behaviors specification
